title: The Banner Saga 2 - Deluxe Edition (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_banner_saga2_2.0.0.2.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: BANNER SAGA 2, THE - DELUXE EDITION
Genre: Strategy - Role-playing - Fantasy
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10) and Mac OS X (10.9+)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Features: single-player
Released: April 19, 2016
Company: Stoic / Versus Evil
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/banner_saga_2_the_deluxe_edition

About:
The Banner Saga 2 - Deluxe Edition includes the game and the soundtrack.
The award-winning adventure continues in Banner Saga 2! This epic, story-based, role-playing game continues its emotional journey across a breaking world. Bold leadership decisions, wise use of resources, and skillful battle tactics are vital to ensure your Viking clans make it through alive. Experience what took the indie gaming world by storm in Banner Saga 2!
The epic Viking saga continues on â€“ beautifully 2D hand drawn combat sequences and animations are further enhanced with special effects, once again accompanied by an evocative score from Grammy-nominated composer Austin Wintory
Player choice that continues to drive your narrative â€“ your story continues based on choices made in the first game as well as hard choices you have to make in this one.
New Characters and a New Race â€“ continue your epic journey interacting with new characters and a new race, the Horseborn.
Improved Strategic combat with consequences â€“ improved, more strategic battle boards enhance combat and permanent loss of characters will still weigh heavy on your mind long after the battle is over.
The journey is as important as battle â€“ your role in building and managing your caravan as you travel the vast landscape is critical to not only your own survival but the survival of an entire civilization.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: XP SP3 / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Storage: 4 GB available space

Recommended system requirements - Windows: 7 / 8 / 10
Memory: 4 GB RAM 
Storage: 6 GB available space
